hedline.hl1: Rapist Sought in Two Attacks in Brooklyn

abstract.p: Police in Brooklyn seek public's help in catching man who they say sexually assaulted two teenagers in Flatbush (S)

block.p: Detectives in Brooklyn are seeking the public's help in catching a man who they said sexually assaulted two teenagers in Flatbush on consecutive Sundays, attacking the young women at gunpoint in elevators.
Lt. Derek Powers, who supervises the investigation of sex crimes in Brooklyn, said the man struck Sept. 3 and last Sunday, following the women into their buildings and riding with them in elevators.

Detectives in Brooklyn are seeking the public's help in catching a man who they said sexually assaulted two teenagers in Flatbush on consecutive Sundays, attacking the young women at gunpoint in elevators.
Lt. Derek Powers, who supervises the investigation of sex crimes in Brooklyn, said the man struck Sept. 3 and last Sunday, following the women into their buildings and riding with them in elevators.

In the first incident, the attacker forced a 16-year-old girl to the roof of her Caton Avenue building, where he raped her, Lieutenant Powers said. In the other, the man tried to rape an 18-year-old woman in the elevator of her Crooke Avenue building, but she escaped.

Lieutenant Powers described the rapist as a black man, between 22 and 30 years old, 5 feet 6 inches to 5 feet 8 inches tall and weighing 150 pounds, with a light complexion and four earrings in his left ear.
